tool.name: odgi view
tool.description: project odgi graph into other formats
tool.help:
@HELP_HEADER@
`odgi view` projects ODGI graphs into other formats such as GFAv1 for inspection or downstream tools.
### Inputs
- **Input odgi graph**: Graph to convert. - **Write graph in GFAv1 format**: Output the graph as GFA. - **Emit node annotations**: Include path annotations in the GFA output. - **Print internal graph structures**: Show structural details on stderr for debugging.
### Outputs
- **GFA**: Projected graph.
